DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of a high-fat meal on the levels of bexagliflozin in the blood in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Effects of a High-Fat Meal on Bexagliflozin in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1. Have a Body mass index (BMI) between 18.0 kg/m2 and 32.0 kg/m2. 2. Are willing to use contraception. 3. Are a nonsmokers for at least 3 months prior to screening. 4. Are willing and able to stay overnight at a clinical research facility as required by the protocol. 1. Women who are nursing or pregnant. 2. Individuals with a clinically significant history of allergy to drugs or latex. 3. Have a history of alcohol or drug dependence in the last 12 months. 4. Have used prescription or overthecounter (OTC) drugs within 14 days of receiving the study drug. 5. Individuals unable (e.g., food intolerance) or unwilling to consume a highfat breakfast within 25 minutes.
